evidence.claim: Rubix Mental Health utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations in their service delivery.
Integration with Twilio for communication services is mentioned on their site.
Rubix supports FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Stripe is used for payment processing in their platform.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of engaging with X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
